title: ISic000092. Honours for Caius Maesius
body:
1C(aio) ❦ Maesio ❦ Aquillio
2Fabio Titiano · c(larissimo) · v(iro) · co(n)s(uli) ❦
3optimo civi ac patrono bene me-
4renti ❦ vac. 3 litt. ordo et populus splen-
5[d]idissimae col(oniae) Aug(ustae) Himereorum
6[The]rmit(anorum) ❦ vac. 1 litt. pecunia sua posuit

1C❦MAESIO❦AQUILLIO
2FABIOTITIANO·C·V·COS❦
3OPTIMOCIVIACPATRONOBENEME
4RENTI❦      ORDOETPOPULUSSPLEN
5[.]IDISSIMAECOLAUGHIMEREORUM
6[...]RMIT❦  PECUNIASUAPOSUIT

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy

English translation

To Gaius Maesius Aquillius Fabius Titianus, a most illustrious man (i.e. of senatorial class), consul, an excellent citizen and patron, well-deserving - the council and people of the most splendid Colonia Augusta Himereorum Thermitanorum erected this at their own expense.

commentary
